item.title: Bonjour !
item.description: My name is Audrey. I am currently a PhD student at Institut Mondor de Recherche Biomédicale (IMRB), in Créteil, France. My project concerns mainly single-cell RNA sequencing data. You can read more about my project here.

item.title: Welcome to my GitHub pages !
item.description: I planned to build my Github pages since some time… Now, I managed to do it ! To do list My To do list contains things I would like to learn how to do : Title Title 2 -- add a search bar on the right of the Github logo, like on pkgdown site build a nice homepage : this happens in contents/_index.md file add a dark / light mode switch in the top right corner, like in Digital Garden theme make Posts only shows posts folder content, and not vignettes… … I will update this !
